ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There are some very odd things in Lavastorm.... I ve heard of people camping safely, only to return and find themselves dead. Talies the Wanderer Check out
ygData.messageBody:
At 05:35 AM 4/13/00 -0700, you wrote:
>Last night when my party zoned into Lavastorm from
>Najena our druid was teleported into a lava pool in
>the far North side of the zone.
>
>She spawned at the Druid Ring in North Karana, but
>she's bound in Freeport.
>
>I petitioned and got her resurected and teleported
>back to us.
>
>ANybody else run into problems like this zoning?


There are some very odd things in Lavastorm.... I've heard of people
camping safely, only to return and find themselves dead.



Talies the Wanderer
Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
